questions.question: Which of these is the best definition of a reversible reaction?

choices.answer: A reaction which releases energy from bonds.
A reaction in which the products can also form the reactants
A reaction which reduces the surrounding temperature.
A reaction in which the products go on to further reactions.

questions.question: At which point on the diagram has the system reached dynamic equilibrium?

choices.answer: time = 0
half way along x-axis
it doesn't reach dynamic equilibrium
the right-hand end of the x-axis

questions.question: If the temperature in this closed system is increased, which reaction is favoured?

choices.answer: endothermic
exothermic
the one with the least products
the one with no gaseous products

questions.question: If you wanted to increase the % yield of hydrated copper sulfate, what should you do?

choices.answer: increase the temperature
decrease the temperature
increase the pressure
decrease the pressure

questions.question: SO<sub>2(g)</sub> + O2<sub>(g)</sub> â‡‹ 2SO<sub>3(g)</sub>    Following Le Chatelier's Principle, increasing the pressure would..

choices.answer: increase the % yield of the exothermic reaction pathway
favour the reaction which produced the most gas molecules
increase the % yield of the endothermic reaction pathway
favour the reaction which produced the least gas molecules
